result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua Jerome Thompson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Joshua Jerome Thompson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Joshua Jerome Thompson was found guilty of Carrying a Concealed Knife, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.231.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Defendant to submit DNA Sample, Ct. 1, 2, and 4 dismissed

records.addlTxt: Judgment of Conviction mailed to defendant at 302 W. Oneida St., Portage and was returned marked "return to sender, insufficient address"
notice of completion of representation filed by Atty Edwards
of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief filed by Atty Edwards

9:28 AM Defendant Joshua Jerome Thompson in court.  Attorney Claire M Edwards in court for Joshua Jerome Thompson.  Prosecuting attorney Margeret Anne Sorrentino in court for the State of Wisconsin. Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct. 3, Court finds defendant guilty, Judgment to be entered, Ct. 1, 2 and 4 dismissed, Ct. 3, Court withholds sentence, probation 12 months, $443.00 costs, defendant to submit DNA Sample, 12 days sentence credit, 9:36 A.M.
Return date on September 30, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on August 16, 2022 at 01:40 pm.

9:18 AM Prosecuting attorney Peggy A. Crooks-Mishacoff in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joshua Jerome Thompson in court.  Attorney Claire M Edwards in court for Joshua Jerome Thompson. Attorney Edwards is waiting for discovery. Requested a new return date and pretrial.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 01:40 pm.
Return date scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Plaintiffs Motion and Demand for Discovery and Notice of DNA and Witness List filed by Atty Crooks-Mishacoff
